findings: WARN: graph_centered - Graph content weighted toward right side due to asymmetric topology. Fit button works but visual balance is inherent to graph structure.
WARN: pan_controls - No dedicated pan control buttons; pan is via pointer drag only.
FAIL: math_rendered - No MathJax content on paper page (SBS-Test paper is text-only, no TeX math formulas in content).
WARN: leanStatement_renders - No :::leanStatement hooks in paper. Theorem references appear as text in ar5iv format.
WARN: leanProof_renders - No embedded Lean proofs in paper. Proof toggles present but expand to empty content.
FAIL: sideBySide_renders - No side-by-side containers in paper. Expected: paper uses ar5iv single-column academic format.
WARN: six_status_colors - 5 of 6 found. notReady (#F4A460) absent because the only notReady node (Base Axiom) has no Lean code.
